Title: [ANN]‚òÖ XNK ‚òÖ Ink Protocol - Decentralizing Marketplaces & Reputation | VC-backed
Body: Replin Gives You a Personal Storefront powered by Ink Protocol‚Äôs Blockchain Reputation and PayPal Payments Sellers can get their very own online storefront to sell on Twitter and across platforms. Author: ChrisBren
Title: [ANN]‚òÖ XNK ‚òÖ Ink Protocol - Decentralizing Marketplaces & Reputation | VC-backed
Body: Proudly Introducing..  Pay With Ink's Creative Community Contest #1 : Gifs, Stickers, and Memes   We are happy to announce our latest community contest!  Today's challenge: Create a gif, sticker or meme for Ink Protocol!  Gifs, stickers, and memes have long been used to liven up interactions over social media, and we would love to see what our community can create! Rewards will be given to the top 3 submissions as decided by Ink Protocol Staff. An additional award will be given to the communities favourite entry as determined by a community vote.   The rules are as follows:  All entries must be related to Ink Protocol 3 entries are permitted per person, so be sure to pick your best! Please submit all entries in English Feel free to use Ink Protocol images/content, but refrain from using licenced material All entries into this competition are subject to the discretion of Ink Protocol Staff, and may be used in future social media posts. All entries must also be sent to our official telegram channel for viewing by the community for the entry to be valid.  NOTE: Sharing through additional social mediums such as twitter or facebook is encouraged, and will be rewarded with retweeting/sharing for exposure at the discretion of Ink Protocol Staff. Be sure to tag our profile! (@Paywithink)    You can find our logos in this google drive folder    Competition rewards:  1st - 20,000 XNK 2nd - 10,000 XNK 3rd - 5,000 XNK Community favourite - 10,000 XNK   Please submit your entries in this form : https://goo.gl/forms/yb42072kNcbTfqOk1  Submissions are opened until January 20th.  Good luck everyone

Title: [ANN]‚òÖ XNK ‚òÖ Ink Protocol - Decentralizing Marketplaces & Reputation | VC-backed
Body: Thank you to everyone who entered into our recent competition, you all worked hard to produce some fantastic material and the team were blown away by the response! You can all definitely look forward to more competitions in the near future.  Now, for the count down...  In 1st place, we have Node with their entry below! A great take on the popular movie arrival, we couldn't go past the movie poster design and the custom Ink Protocol Symbol. Well done!    In 2nd place, Melvin with their .gif entry! A neat and informative gif utilising our own design elements! Fantastic work!    And in 3rd place, Sasha88 with their .gif entry! So many meanings to take away from this stunning gif, the main one we interpreted being Ink Protocol reaching for the stars!    Congratulations to our winners, but we aren't quite done yet.. Our community vote be released later today, with the top 12 entries outside of our above winners to be voted on for the prize!  Thanks again everyone! üòÄ

Author: S3cco
Title: [ANN]‚òÖ XNK ‚òÖ Ink Protocol - Decentralizing Marketplaces & Reputation | VC-backed
Body: Bitcoin Garden: Ink Protocol stores Transferable Reputation to P2P marketplaces and disrupts monopolistic practices https://bitcoingarden.org/ink-protocol-stores-transferable-reputation-to-p2p-marketplaces-and-disrupts-monopolistic-practices/  Ink Protocol endeavors to take away the monopolistic power from marketplaces which have the ability to modify your reputation, censor, or otherwise filter out your feedback, and most importantly, they are able to charge extremely high fees (20‚Äì30% in some cases) because they own your reputation data and you are now locked into their platform.  Ink Protocol is a decentralized reputation and payment protocol looking to bring transferable reputation to P2P marketplaces. It is currently live on the Listia platform and plans to expand to other P2P marketplaces where the lack of reputation is a major driver for centralization and monopolistic practices.  This is the way Ink Protocol disrupts centralized marketplace monopolies: First, the smart contract will feature a decentralized feedback mechanism, where buyers can leave feedback for the seller about each transaction. This feedback will consist of a rating and comment about the transaction, stored as public data on the Ethereum blockchain.  Second, as more third-party marketplaces adopt Ink Protocol, this feedback will be stored for each marketplace and aggregated together between all markets to form a decentralized reputation for each user, identified by their Ethereum address....

Title: [ANN]‚òÖ XNK ‚òÖ Ink Protocol - Decentralizing Marketplaces & Reputation | VC-backed
Body: What kind of verification level will be needed to convert Listia credits to XNK? What will we exactly have to do to be able to use the new currency?  I believe that a complicated verification method might deter many existing users. Will there be a transition period to use both currencies simultaneously? How long will it last?

Author: geehwan
Title: [ANN]‚òÖ XNK ‚òÖ Ink Protocol - Decentralizing Marketplaces & Reputation | VC-backed
Body: For users who are converting their Listia credits into XNK, the Listia user account just needs to be a verified account as defined on listia.com right now. This typically includes a verified phone number and/or address. SO it shouldn't be too complicated at all.  For participants in the upcoming pre-sale and crowd sale, their will be a more through KYC process for our whitelist coming soon.  There will be a slight transition period as older credit listings disappear, and all new listings are listed in XNK. However, both currencies will be able to be used on any type of listing It will last as long as there are still old credit listings that are live.. but basically after a week, almost everything will be in XNK.

Author: geehwan
Title: [ANN]‚òÖ XNK ‚òÖ Ink Protocol - Decentralizing Marketplaces & Reputation | VC-backed
Body: Old, centralized marketplaces like eBay have a monopoly on your reputation and feedback. Ink Protocol believes in a decentralized future, where you can build reputation and take it with you everywhere you sell. We imagine a world where you can take your eBay reputation and use it to sell on Craigslist. Ink Protocol also has built-in escrow and 3rd party dispute resolution to make P2P marketplace payments safe and easy!  Ink Protocol is developed by Listia, an 8 year old VC-backed company with a thriving existing marketplace. Listia.com will become the first marketplace that is fully integrated with Ink, giving it an immediate use-case (10M registered users and over 100M items trade since 2009)!  XNK Token distribution is planned for February 2018. You can join the Air Drop and Bounty programs though Listia (see details below) and start earning future tokens right now!  Listia Inc. Investors:               AIR DROP + BOUNTIES  All verified members that have earned Listia Credits (excluding purchased credits) from now until launch can convert their credits directly to XNK after the token distribution event. Sign up on Listia to get 1,000-5,000+ Credits immediately. You can then earn more by selling your used goods on Listia, inviting friends or through various activities, but all you need to do is sign up to participate in the air drop and start earning additional bounties. Thanks!  Listia registration: Sign up on Listia or search the app store for Listia in order to join the air drop. The Ink Protocol website doesn't have a way to join the air drop.  [/size]

Author: bubbler63
Title: [ANN]‚òÖ XNK ‚òÖ Ink Protocol - Decentralizing Marketplaces & Reputation | VC-backed
Body: Very excited to be a part of this project. Ink is one of the few projects that, upon release, will be backed by an established company and marketplace. Our users will be transacting with Ink directly when they buy and sell on Listia. This brings adoption, usage, and liquidity to Ink immediately. The many ecosystems that will spawn off from this project will be amazing as well: feedback/reputation aggregators, mediator registry, and policy registry.  Looking forward to bringing Ink to life!

Author: ludmila79
Title: [ANN]‚òÖ XNK ‚òÖ Ink Protocol - Decentralizing Marketplaces & Reputation | VC-backed
Body: Hey, sounds really interesting, but can you tell the audience a bit more how smart contracts are gonna be used in this project? For protection, etc...

Author: bubbler63
Title: [ANN]‚òÖ XNK ‚òÖ Ink Protocol - Decentralizing Marketplaces & Reputation | VC-backed
Body: Great question! Let's get technical!  First, reference our Whitepaper to get a good overview of our mission and how we plan on getting there.  At the Ethereum level, we will basically be using our Ink smart contract to drive our Ink transaction states: https://paywithink.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/Ink-State-Diagram.pdf  Our smart contract will be responsible for:  - Creation of transactions by the buyer - Acceptance of transaction by the seller - Handle disputes between buyer and seller - Request mediator interaction if necessary - Allow mediator to determine the outcome of the transaction (where the Ink goes) - Allow buyer to leave feedback on the transaction once it's completed - Linking accounts/addresses so that reputation aggregators will be able to combine reputation between 2 or more accounts/addresses. - Authorize an agent to create/progress/complete transactions on your behalf. This is useful more marketplaces (like Listia) to make transactions on behalf of our users.  The functions outlined in the state diagram are the actual functions we've implemented on our smart contract. Once we get closer to the launch, we will be publishing our smart contract on GitHub.  Let me know if you have any further questions!

Author: geehwan
Title: [ANN]‚òÖ XNK ‚òÖ Ink Protocol - Decentralizing Marketplaces & Reputation | VC-backed
Body: Great description of the tech! Just wanted to add that Ink has built-in 3rd party mediation support.. so the contract handles escrow just alike a centralized marketplace might do it.. so it's great for buying and selling from people you don't know online and in forums etc.

Author: geehwan
Title: [ANN]‚òÖ XNK ‚òÖ Ink Protocol - Decentralizing Marketplaces & Reputation | VC-backed

To join the air drop, you just have to register on our existing marketplace app at Listia.com or search for Listia on the iOS or Google Play app stores.  Sorry there's no direct link form the Ink project website.  enjoy!

Author: geehwan
Title: [ANN]‚òÖ XNK ‚òÖ Ink Protocol - Decentralizing Marketplaces & Reputation | VC-backed
Body: Yes, Listia is building Ink. Ink will become the new main currency on Listia, replacing Listia Credits. So it has an immediate use-case right from the start, unlike most tokens  Also, the team is building standalone apps so anyone can use Ink on Craigslist, FB Marketplace, etc..  many marketplaces could benefit from adding a reputation system like Ink. Long term, we hope other marketplaces will implement Ink as well! In fact, anyone can build a new marketplace using the Ink protocol and get up and running very quickly
